Talks

Group highlights

**At the end of this page, you can find the full list of talks.

First Measurement of Coherent Elastic Neutrino Nucleus Scattering of Solar 8B Neutrinos in XENONnT

First Release of the XENONnT B8 CEvNS Result

15th International Workshop on the Identification of Dark Matter (IDM 2024, L’Aquila)

Fei Gao

Event and Slides

Accidental Coincidence Background in XENONnT for Low Energy Nuclear Recoil Search

A toughout introduction of the AC modeling methods in XENONnT. (Best Presenter Award at the Direct Detection Session)

15th International Workshop on the Identification of Dark Matter (IDM 2024, L’Aquila)

Kexin Liu

Event and Slides

RELICS: Search for Coherent Elastic Neutrino-Nucleus Scattering from reactor neutrinos using LXeTPC

The Reactor Experiment for Liquid Xenon Coherent Scattering (RELICS) aims to construct a 50-kilogram-scale liquid xenon detector (LXeTPC) to detect CEvNS signals from reactor neutrinos.

International Workshop on Application of Noble Gas Xenon to Science and Technology” (XeSAT2024)

Chang Cai

Event and Slides

Dual-Phased Xenon Time Projection Chamber Prototype for the RELICS Neutrino Experiment

Summarize the design, construction, and operation of the RELICS prototype.

International Workshop on Application of Noble Gas Xenon to Science and Technology” (XeSAT2024)

Lingfeng Xie

Event and Slides

Development, Operation, and Testing of a Prototype Liquid Xenon Reactor Neutrino Detector

To validate the RELICS detector,we have built a prototype liquid xenon detector with an effective mass of 0.56 kilograms, equipped with experimental systems for cooling, purification, and data acquisition.

Conference on frontiers of underground and space particle physics and cosmophysics, COUSP2024, May 2024, Xichang

Yifei Zhao

Event and Slides

First Measurement of Solar B-8 Neutrinos via Coherent Elastic Neutrino-Nucleus Scattering with XENONnT

A detailed view of the search for solar B-8 CEvNS signals in XENONnT

Seminar (Oct 11, 2024, Sun Yat-sen Univeristy)

Kexin Liu

Event

First Measurement of Solar B-8 Neutrinos via Coherent Elastic Neutrino-Nucleus Scattering with XENONnT

A detailed view of the search for solar B-8 CEvNS signals in XENONnT

Seminar (Aug 20, 2024, IHEP)

Kexin Liu

Event

New Physics Search with Electronics Recoils from the XENONnT Experiment

A general XENONnT talk, with the latest result of lowER search.

XI International Conference on New Frontiers in Physics (ICNFP 2022)

Kexin Liu

Slides
